description.raw:
I check the dependencies of the current ROS package using `rospack deps` on the current package folder before trying to build and give the user a warning if there are dependency problems. I added the warning to sandia_hand_teleop because this is where the build gets stuck. Here's the warning it gives now if the ROS_PACKAGE_PATH isn't set properly:
~~~
CMake Error at CMakeLists.txt:13 (message):
  You have a ROS package dependency problem: [rospack] Error: package/stack
  sandia_hand_teleop depends on non-existent package osrf_msgs
~~~
